alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wayne and east central Washtenaw Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Canton to Greenfield Village to near Belle Isle. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Downtown Detroit around 255 PM EDT. Wyandotte and Belle Isle around 300 PM EDT. Dearborn and Northville around 310 PM EDT. Grosse Pointe around 315 PM EDT. Detroit around 320 PM EDT. Livonia around 335 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Inkster, Highland Park, Melvindale, Redford, Plymouth, Garden City, Northeast Detroit, Wayne, Northwest Detroit and Harper Woods. People attending the PGA Tournament at the Detroit Golf Club should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
